description.value:
Cannot be removed after attached as long as character is alive. Whilst worn acts as a Null Rod (+30 to Resist Psychic Powers that affect character), Force Weapons do not gain benefits against Character. If placed around a defenceless Psyker, they are agonizingly choked to death unless they burn 1d5 Infamy or a Fate Point.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
